9 times 401 sts © sonder yarn co 2024 | www sonderyarnco com | for personal use only a simple affair | page 4 pattern cont d twisted rib border note from this point in the pattern you will only be increasing on the rs of the shawl 6 sts each rs row row 1 rs kfb kfb *k1tbl p1 repeat from * to marker m1r sm k1tbl pm m1l *p1 k1tbl repeat from * to last 4 sts p1 kfb kfb k1 6 sts increased row 2 ws *p1tbl k1 repeat from * to 1 stitch before marker p1tbl sm p1tbl sm *p1tbl k1 repeat from * to last stitch p1tbl row 3 kfb kfb *k1tbl p1 repeat from * to one st before marker k1tbl m1r sm k1tbl sm m1l k1tbl *p1 k1tbl repeat from * to last 4 sts p1 kfb kfb k1 6 sts increased row 4 *p1tbl k1 repeat from * to marker sm p1tbl sm *k1 p1tbl repeat from * to end of row note the pm on row 1 should be read as sm on the following repeats repeat row 1 - 4 two more times 437 sts work two row in stockinette stitch as follows no more increases row 1 knit all stitches row 2 purl all stitches finishing bind off sts loosely sew in ends and block abbreviations k knit k1tbl knit stitch through back look k2tog knit 2 stitches together kfb
